t = int(input())
for distractions in range(t):
    (X, N) = map(int, input().split())
    print(N % (X + 1))

    (wife, life) = map(int, input().split())
    print(life % (wife + 1))

for _ in range(t):

for _ in range(t):

for t in range(int(input())):
    (n, x) = [int(_) for _ in input().split()]
    n += 1
    print(x % n)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    print(x % (n + 1))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    result = x % (n + 1)
    print(result)

t = int(input())
while t:
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    print(y % (x + 1))
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    c = x % (n + 1)
    print(c)
